title: Apartment for Rent: Lindengracht 60 III
description: Wonderfully renovated and unfurnished 1 bedroom apartment in one of the nicest locations in Jordaan. The apartment has an A+++ label. Layout: Through the shared entrance, you reach the apartment on the third floor. You enter the apartment into the hallway from where there is access to all rooms. The entire house has underfloor heating and light floors, designer lighting, and luxurious finishes. The living room with open kitchen.
